name: 2020 Space Odyssey
description:
A game jam project done in 4 days! 

Credits:

Everyone designed the game as a team, but here's some other roles people took on.

ZODIACKILLER- Programming
Justin Vrieling - Programming
Gabe - Particle effects
superDMT - Pixel Art assets
Arvin - Sound effects (and a few other bits and pieces)
Zyph97- Icon design/art

In this classic arcade styled shoot-em-up, players compete to survive the longest and get the highest score! Collect powerups (but avoid the negative powerups) to aid you in surviving the endless onslaught!

(unfortunately there's no exit from within the game, you'll have to hit alt+f4 or something to close it)
